message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $12,000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget. Can you meet me halfway?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $9,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $9,250. Can you consider this price?
